resources.string:
If you could suggest any additional learning or ways to spread excellence then please let us know by emailing us at GREATix@wales.nhs.uk 

Please take the time to report more excellence and encourage your colleagues to do the same. 

Thank you and well done.
Consultant Anaesthetist and Great-ix Lead, Royal Gwent Hospital\n\n

Royal Gwent Hospital 
Cardiff Road, Newport 
Gwent, NP20 2UB. 

www.greatix.org 
greatix.abb@wales.nhs.uk

This App is for all staff working across Aneurin Bevan UHB to submit a GREAT-ix form about a colleague or team. 

Thanks for taking the time to report the great things they have done! :-) 

Please enter the password to proceed to the submission page.

*** No patient identifiable information should be included *** 

If you have forgotten the password, please send an email to abuhb.greatix@wales.nhs.uk, with your staff role, and we will provide you with the password.


 The app has been designed and set up for use for Theatres/Anaesthetics/ICU at The Royal Gwent Hospital, but if you are interested in using in your hospital/dept then please email melanie.poole@wales.nhs.uk.

GREAT-ix makes showing your appreciation for a colleague's dedication official and easy!

The app has been designed and set up for use for Theatres/Anaesthetics/ICU at The Royal Gwent Hospital, but if you are interested in using in your hospital/dept then please email melanie.poole@wales.nhs.uk.
